title: HVAC Project Manager (Visa Sponsorship Available)
description: Are you a Project Engineer with HVAC experience looking to join a company offering progression into Project Management, specific industry training into Renewables / O&G, and great company benefits including sponsorship if required?

title: Licenced Aircraft Engineer - Visa Sponsorship Available
salary: £70000 - £76000 per annum + Benefits Package + Visa Sponsorship
description: London £76,000 + Benefits Package + Industry Leader + Overtime + Medical Care + Paid Travel + Training Provided + Pension + Immediate Start - This company prides themselves on safety, reliability, and exceptional service in the air. As they continue to expand and evolve, they are seeking a highly skilled and dedicated B1/B2 Licenced Aircraft Engineer to join our expert team. This is a fantastic opportunity for an individual with experience in aircraft maintenance and safety systems to work with a leading airline that offers excellent benefits, opportunities for professional development, and a supportive work environment. As a Licenced Aircraft Engineer, you will be responsible for performing maintenance on various types of aircraft, focusing on both safety systems and general aircraft maintenance.

title: Sponsorship Account Manager
description: If so, apply to become our new Sponsorship Account Manager and join our work on promoting safety and sustainability. The newly created Sponsorship Account Manager at the Institution of Structural Engineers (IStructE) will become a pivotal role responsible for increasing ongoing commercial success through the management and delivery of sponsorship activities. Key responsibilities include achieving an annual sponsorship target of £100,000, facilitating stakeholder engagement, providing operational support for the FindanEngineer platform, and managing both online and in-person sponsored events. title: Electronics Design Engineer (Offering Sponsorship)
description: Hummanby, Filey, North Yorkshire £50,000 to £60,000 + Company Pension + Good Holiday Benefits + Good life to Work Balance - Are you an Electronics Design Engineer with good, varied experience in digital and hardware design looking for the next step in your career to become a Senior Engineer? Do you want to join an exciting expanding company with the chance to progress your technical skills and move up to a managerial position? On offer, is a great opportunity for an aspiring Electronics Design Engineer to join a leading company in developing noise monitoring equipment. With over 50 years of experience and reaching 30 expert engineers, this company is well-established within the noise technology industry, commited to preventing noise-induced hearing loss and noise pollution.
